dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
PSI/J is an abstraction layer over cluster schedulers to write scheduler
agnostic HPC applications.
dependencies.name: py-psij-python

dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependencies.name: py-pymongo

dependencies.description:
RADICAL-GTOD provides a single method, gtod, which returns the current
time in seconds since epoch (01.01.1970) with sub-second resolution and
a binary tool, radical-gtod, which is a compiled binary and does not
require the invocation of the Python interpreter.
dependencies.name: py-radical-gtod

dependencies.description:
RADICAL-SAGA (RS) implements the interface specification of the Open
Grid Forum (OGF) Simple API for Grid Applications (SAGA) standard. RS
works as a light-weight access layer for distributed computing
infrastructures, providing adaptors for different middleware systems and
services.
dependencies.name: py-radical-saga

dependencies.description:
RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.
dependencies.name: py-radical-utils

dependencies.description:
The setproctitle module allows a process to change its title (as
displayed by system tools such as ps and top).
dependencies.name: py-setproctitle

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Virtual package for the Exaworks SDK packages.
dependent_to.name: exaworks

dependent_to.description:
RADICAL Ensemble Toolkit is used for developing and executing large-
scale ensemble-based workflows.
dependent_to.name: py-radical-entk

description:
RADICAL-Pilot is a Pilot system specialized in executing applications
composed of many computational tasks on high performance computing (HPC)
platforms.
name: py-radical-pilot

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
